constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 48 (Thursday, March 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KAPTUR:
H.R. 7131.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1 (Taxing and Spending Clause)
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 (Commerce Clause)
Article I, Section 8, clause 18 (Necessary and Proper
Clause)
[Page H3828]

latestAction.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H4011-4012)

title: Great Lakes Authority Act of 2022
